column1: Chief Security Officer Ajith Kumara Rathnayake in his evidence has also corroborated
the evidence of the Security Manager Ukwatte Hewage Dayawansha Dharmapriya on
the fact that the Employee had indeed confessed to the Security Manager that he threw
the pipes over the wall of the Company. The said evidence of the Chief Security Officer
